name: Duality (itch) (ron.k_18)
description:
Duality

wow we made this

This game is about controlling two characters with the opposing properties of Strength and Speed. Use your brain to navigate these bad boys through these puzzles of gates and switches to gather the key item(s) to unlock the door and exit to freedom. 

Basic game controls
  • W, A, S, D: Move Strength Cube (Red)
  • Up, Down, Left, Right arrow keys: Move Speed Cube (Blue)
  • R: Reset
  • Esc: Exit to main menu [Soon to be implemented]
